title: OpenAI unveils GPT-4o mini for faster multimodal flows
summary: OpenAI introduced GPT-4o mini, a compact multimodal model aimed at low-latency reasoning and voice experiences while keeping costs down for developers.

title: Anthropic ships Claude 3.5 Sonnet to enterprise clients
summary: Claude 3.5 Sonnet pushes reasoning accuracy, adds vision support, and lands inside the Claude Enterprise suite with deeper admin controls.

title: Meta releases Llama 3.1 with 405B parameter flagship
summary: Meta AI announced Llama 3.1 with expanded context windows, better multilingual coverage, and a 405B parameter option tuned for retrieval-augmented systems.

title: NVIDIA details Blackwell GPUs and GB200 NVL72 rack
summary: At GTC the company lifted the lid on Blackwell architecture, highlighting GB200 superchips and liquid-cooled racks tuned for frontier training budgets.
